name: oj-rgbu-jraf-simple-donut-chart
description: A Simple Donut Chart variation of the JET pie chart displaying a label in the center.

series.description: An array of series objects for the JET oj-chart pie graph.

groups.description: An array of groups objects for the JET oj-chart pie graph.

valueFormats.description: An object specifying value formatting and tooltip behavior, whose keys generally correspond to the attribute names on the data items.

centerLabel.description: Label to display in the center of the donut chart.
